enb_long_title: Tenth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
section_title: Emissions from fuel used for international aviation
sentences: PERU said that the draft conclusions remain bracketed in their entirety.
ARGENTINA stressed the lack of concrete data and information available on this topic.
Parties agreed to remove the brackets, and SBSTA adopted the conclusions, as amended (FCCC/SBSTA/2004/L.18).
